articles.title: Stormy Daniels' Surprising Reaction to Trump's Guilty Verdict
articles.description: Daniels testified in the hush money trial, recalling how she met Trump at a celebrity golf tournament and the one-night stand she says they had.
articles.content:
Stormy Daniels celebrated Donald Trump's conviction by liking a post from the former president's nemesis, Kathy Griffin.
